stocktrader

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocktrader.Portfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Portfolio
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Portfolio data structure that holds the stock quotes and pending orders of a User.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
